metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5096 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
A use-after-free vulnerability can occur while editing events in formelements on a page, resulting in a potentially exploitable crash. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 52.6 and Thunderbird < 52.6.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5096` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

thunderbird - 1:52.6.0+build1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
thunderbird-globalmenu - 1:52.6.0+build1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:52.6.0+build1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:52.6.0+build1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
thunderbird-testsuite - 1:52.6.0+build1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:52.6.0+build1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:52.6.0+build1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:52.6.0+build1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:52.6.0+build1-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
